title: The Takeaways From FedEx's Raised Profit Forecast
description: FedEx said adjusted earnings will be $17.80 to $19 a share for the fiscal year, the courier said in a statement, raising the low end of its prior profit forecast. The midpoint of that range is higher than the $18.28 per share average analyst estimate compiled by Bloomberg. Thomas Black, a Bloomberg Opinion columnist, has more on "Bloomberg The Close." (Source: Bloomberg)
